name: Transfer LinkedIn Leads to KlickTipp
description: This template streamlines the process of moving LinkedIn leads into KlickTipp. Each time a form submission is received, the scenario identifies the form name and routes the lead accordingly. The contact is then created or updated in KlickTipp, and the correct tag is applied based on the specific form. By automating this flow, your lead management becomes faster, more consistent, and error-free, ensuring that all incoming prospects are immediately available for segmentation and follow-up campaigns in KlickTipp.
